attributes.action: Dogs should be made to wear leads in fields with sheep or any other animals
attributes.additional_details: Sheep and ewes are getting killed by being chased by dogs
attributes.background: Ban dogs off leads in fields

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make it mandatory for all dogs to be on leads in public places.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710271
